summary: The bill, titled the COACHES Act, amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain educational expenses of interscholastic sports administrators and coaches, including nonathletic supplies, to be included in the above-the-line deduction for eligible educators. It also updates the code to include interscholastic sports administrators and coaches in the deduction. The amendments are effective for taxable years beginning after December 31, 2023.
